Desc.entry: A support group run by South Yorkshire Fire and Rescue Service offering a meeting and support structure for people who have lost someone through a fire, road traffic accident or any other traumatic death incident. The group provides telephone and email support to individuals and can offer one-to-one visits as well as arranging regular support group sessions where both individuals and families can meet and share with others who have experienced similar circumstances.

Telephone.entry: Voicemail, please leave a message and someone from HOPE will always call back

ProvisionPlace.entry: South Yorkshire Fire Training Development Centre

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Wed in the month, please contact for meeting dates
